nodes.text: Cyborg Operations was part of Jabba the Hutt's court under the control of the sadistic droid, EV-9D9. Located deep on the lower levels of Jabba's Palace on Tatooine, this division of Jabba's organization would eradicate the personality and programming of droids before they were put into Jabba's employ. Both a "GNK power droid" and a courier droid were tortured repeatedly here.
